attributes.action: Allow the COVID-19 restrictions and rules to be reviewed by the public.
attributes.additional_details: the UK population should be given the choice on how the country moves forward from COVID-19.
attributes.background: The Government’s local lockdowns, restrictions and regulations in relation to COVID-19 are causing more harm and significant adverse impact to the public, businesses, education, employment and mental health.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
